text: Barry Atsma (born 29 December 1972) is an English-born Dutch actor. Atsma played Michael in the 2014 comedy-drama Hector and the Search for Happiness and Christie in the 2018 British television series The Split.BARRY ATSMA OVER ZIJN SCHEIDING: 'HET WAS EEN SOORT EXPLOSIE IN MIJN HOOFD' ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Actors from London
title: Barry Atsma
